thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Cecil the lion

author: news24.com
title: Cecil the lion
text:
While it is sad that Cecil was killed I am glad to see that Walter Palmer has been exonerated from criminal charges related to this.
Whatever your own position is regarding hunting in general and trophy hunting in particular this man had done no wrong.
I hope Walter can now resume his life and hopefully, one day, return to Africa to hunt again.
The thousands of overseas hunters that visit Africa to hunt each year contribute billions towards conservation and job creation. Something, we in Africa, cannot afford to lose.
